titles.title: Enhancing Retirement Security for Medicare Beneficiaries Act of 2019

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for certain rules regarding the treatment of eligible retirement plans in determining the eligibility of individuals for premium and cost-sharing subsidies under part D of the Medicare program, and for other purposes.
Enhancing Retirement Security for Medicare Beneficiaries Act of 2019

bill.summary:
Enhancing Retirement Security for Medicare Beneficiaries Act of 2019
This bill alters certain financial standards that are used to determine eligibility for the low-income subsidy program under the Medicare prescription drug benefit. Specifically, the bill excludes certain retirement plans from eligibility determinations.
